name: Basic Cube
description: Basic 1x1 cube module for structural support

name: Lens (positive)
description: Optical lens module for beam focusing

name: Lens (negative)
description: Optical lens module for beam focusing

name: Lens (aspheric)
description: Optical lens module for beam focusing

name: Photodiode Detector
description: Silicon photodiode detector for power measurement and alignment.

name: Lens (negative)
description: Optical lens module for beam focusing

name: Sample Holder 1x1
description: Clamp module for holding microscope slides or samples.

name: Kinematic Mirror Mount
description: Adjustable mirror mount with tip/tilt alignment screws.

name: Kinematic Mirror Mount 90
description: Right‑angle kinematic mirror mount for beam folding.

name: Fiber Coupler Cube
description: Cube module with FC/PC adapter for coupling light into optical fiber.

name: Raspberry Pi Camera Cube
description: 2×1 cube integrating the Raspberry Pi HQ camera for imaging.

name: LED Matrix Cube
description: 8×8 RGB LED matrix for patterned illumination.

name: Torch 1x1
description: White LED torch module for general illumination.

name: Screen Holder 1x1
description: Holder for projection screens or diffusers.

name: Uc2 Electronics v3
description: This is the electronics to drive all kinds of actuators, sensors and indicators

name: XY Galvo Mirror Setup
description: Galvo mirrors that can be used for scanning a beam

name: UC2 XY Stage e.g. for microdiamonds
Mini XY Translation Mount (16 mm Cage)
description: Compact XY translation mount compatible with 16 mm cage systems; internal SM05 threads for Ø1/2" optics; ±1.0 mm travel in X and Y; 4-40 cage taps.

name: Kinematic Grating Mount Adapter (Ø1" Mounts)
description: Adapter for mounting rectangular gratings in Ø1" front-loading kinematic mirror mounts; ideal for 20–60 mm grating heights with precision tip/tilt.

name: Fiber‑Coupled Single‑Mode Laser
description: Single‑mode diode laser with FC/APC fiber output for stable, low‑noise delivery; ideal for excitation and alignment.

name: Compact Spectrometer (Fiber‑Coupled)
description: Array spectrometer with SMA905 fiber input for 200–1000 nm measurements; suitable for irradiance and transmission/absorbance.

name: Adjustable Slit
description: Micrometer‑driven variable slit for defining entrance apertures; can mount in cage systems.

name: Focus‑Tunable Lens
description: Electrically tunable lens enabling fast, continuous focus adjustment without moving the optic.

name: Raspberry Pi Controller
description: Single‑board computer for device control and acquisition; GPIO for LEDs, motors, sensors; runs Python.

name: XYZ Translation Stage (Compact)
description: Compact XYZ micrometer stage for sample positioning and alignment.

name: XYZ Translation Stage (Compact, motorized)
description: Compact XYZ micrometer stage for sample positioning and alignment. Motorized with Micrometer precise stepper motors

name: DMD Patterning Module (DLP4500)
description: Digital micromirror device for structured illumination and maskless projection; visible‑range window.

name: Iris Diaphragm
description: Continuously adjustable aperture for intensity control.

name: ND Filter Wheel
description: Selectable neutral‑density filters for precise attenuation.

name: C‑Mount Camera Adapter
description: Adapter for C‑mount cameras to the cube system.

name: Tube Lens
description: Infinity‑corrected tube lens for microscope systems.

name: Filter Wheel
description: Holds multiple filters for rapid switching.

name: Rotation Stage
description: 360° rotation with vernier for polarizer/optic alignment.

name: Controller To control motors and light
Puzzle Piece to connect multiple cubes in xyz
